examples.example: 我买了一台新电脑，它的性能非常棒。

translate.english: I bought a new computer and its performance is very great.

examples.example: 我拥有一台钢琴，它给我的生活带来了无尽的欢乐和享受。

translate.english: I own a piano, which brings endless joy and enjoyment to my life.

examples.example: 我家有一台电视机，它给我们带来了很多欢乐时光。

translate.english: There is a TV set in my home, and it has brought us a lot of happy time.
